welcome_message_title: Welcome to Bom Jesus dos Perdoes
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bom Jesus dos Perdoes, a charming city nestled in the beautiful countryside of Brazil. Known for its historical landmarks and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braganca Paulista Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Guarulhos Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Guarulhos Airport, mainly used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Guarulhos Airport, mainly used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
